Public Sub New (volumeIds As IList(Of String), Optional id As String = null, Optional name As String = null, Optional type As String = null, Optional kind As Nullable(Of Kind) = null, Optional nextBackupTime As Nullable(Of DateTime) = null, Optional lastBackupTime As Nullable(Of DateTime) = null, Optional schedulesCount As Nullable(Of Long) = null, Optional scheduledBackupStatus As Nullable(Of ScheduledBackupStatus) = null, Optional backupPolicyCreationType As Nullable(Of BackupPolicyCreationType) = null, Optional ssmHostName As String = null)

Docs.param: The path IDs of the volumes which are part of the backup policy.
The path ID that uniquely identifies the object.
The hierarchical type of the object.
The Kind of the object. Currently only Series8000 is supported. Possible values include: 'Series8000'
The time of the next backup for the backup policy.
The time of the last backup for the backup policy.
The count of schedules the backup policy contains.
Indicates whether atleast one of the schedules in the backup policy is active or not. Possible values include: 'Disabled', 'Enabled'
The backup policy creation type. Indicates whether this was created through SaaS or through StorSimple Snapshot Manager. Possible values include: 'BySaaS', 'BySSM'
If the backup policy was created by StorSimple Snapshot Manager, then this field indicates the hostname of the StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
